title: Meet the retired oil exec plugging forgotten wells to reduce emissions

multiple-choice.question: What is an orphan well, and why is it a concern for the environment?

options.label: A
options.text: An orphan well is a well that has been abandoned and is no longer owned by a company, but is still leaking methane and other pollutants into the environment.

options.label: B
options.text: An orphan well is a well that has been plugged and is no longer leaking methane and other pollutants into the environment.

options.label: C
options.text: An orphan well is a well that is still being used by a company, but is not properly maintained.

options.label: D
options.text: An orphan well is a well that has never been used.

multiple-choice.question: According to the transcript, how many orphan oil and gas wells are estimated to exist across America?
What is the main goal of the Well Done Foundation, a non-profit organization founded by Curtis Shuck?

options.label: A
options.text: To drill new oil and gas wells

options.label: B
options.text: To plug abandoned oil and gas wells

options.label: C
options.text: To promote the use of renewable energy

options.label: D
options.text: To lobby for changes in oil and gas regulations

multiple-choice.question: How much can it cost to plug an orphan well?
According to the transcript, how many people live within a mile of an orphan well in the US?
What is the name of the company that measures air pollution to hunt down the biggest leaks?
How much money was earmarked in the 2021 infrastructure bill for well pluggings?
According to the transcript, how many oil and gas producers have declared bankruptcy in the last seven years?
What is the name of the act that was passed in 2021 to address the problem of orphan wells on a federal level?
According to the transcript, what is the main solution to the problem of orphan wells?

options.label: A
options.text: To get the oil and gas industry to front more of the bill

options.label: B
options.text: To plug all the wells immediately

options.label: D
options.text: To wait for the government to take action
